website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight bike rack puts functionality and security first.
pros: Lightweight and easy to attach and remove
There are locking systems for both bikes, and a lock to secure the rack to the vehicle
cons: Doesn't handle the elements of weather like it should
Screws may become loose in a short period

customer_reviews.title: I transported a 650B and a 29er from Utah through Nevada with serious crosswinds to California and I was driving pretty fast. I
customer_reviews.text: I am buying this rack a second time after getting rear-ended and the first rack getting damaged. I was impressed with the stability and bike security. I transported a 650B and a 29er from Utah through Nevada with serious crosswinds to California and I was driving pretty fast. I am impressed with this rack. Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Bike Rack!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I LOVE this bike rack. I was very worried about ordering a bike rack online, sight unseen. Thule products are always great, so that helped ease my mind a bit. We received the package and opened it immediately. It looks awesome on our 4Runner. Our two bikes fit perfectly and they are very secure. There is a lock the attached the rack to your hitch and a lock to attach your bikes to the rack. We feel safe leaving our bikes if we need to run in the store or something. I would definitely recommend this bike rack. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike Rack!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike rack!! So much nicer than the trunk mount that I used to use. It's sturdy and it was easy to set up. Holds both of my bikes very well and securely. Was easy to mount my bikes on it. I set my bikes on the trays that hold the tires, folded the straps over them and locked them down, then pushed the lever down and locked over the frame. Comes with locks so it can't be stolen! Locks for bikes and for the hitch! Looks great on my car too! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Green

customer_reviews.title: Not made for the long haul.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this rack when I first got it. I have now owned the rack for about a year and a half and parts that should not wear out are failing. The worst is the belt that locks the hooks is separating from the upright tube, without a repair I have no way to lock the hooks in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ken M

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Good build quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what can be expected of a Thule. Sturdy. Good build quality. Easy mounting of bikes. I looked at the Yakima, Saris and Kuat racks. They are all good racks as well, but this one came it at the best deal and for what I was looking for otherwise. It is stock/OEM designed for a 1.25" hitch, but does come with a step-down adapter so it can be used in a 2" hitch, like mine.
customer_reviews.author: TBC Titan

customer_reviews.title: For the cost, not that great
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Kuat two weeks earlier for the Honda Pilot. I wanted another for my other car and did not want to spent $600 again. This Thule was approx half the cost but also half the quality. It is still very useful otherwise. Did a road trip (550 miles) and it held ok.
customer_reviews.author: NJM (member since 2011)

customer_reviews.title: Novice rider loves this bike rack
customer_reviews.text: When I decided to take up riding, I asked my riding buddies and by far this was the recommended rack for someone like me who didnt want a roof mount or something that wld harm the bike. I also wanted 2 slots so I could carry a partner bike. This was super simple to assemble- I did it myself with 4 boys watching me, and everything was there- everything fit- the directions were perfect. I also did all the adjustments and put it on my car alone! Yay me! LOVE this rack. Its definitely worth the price and it arrived at my door in great packaging, and it was heavy!!!
customer_reviews.author: RMDY

customer_reviews.title: Advertisement picture is incorrect. The bolts were not included ...
customer_reviews.text: Advertisement picture is incorrect. The bolts were not included and nothing stated in the ad warns you of the fact. Not knowing this in advance will require going to the store to find bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Blackshaw

customer_reviews.title: the quality of the rack and ease of use is good. However
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the bike rack for our Kia Sorrento. Overall, the quality of the rack and ease of use is good. However, after one weekend road trip to Colorado and a few trips to the local riding spots, two of the clamps that hold the tires in place are damaged and unusable. I would expect them to last more than 60 days and now I'm having trouble finding just the clamps to replace them. Having to use bungee cords kind of defeats the purpose of the "all in one" rack... Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Saved out Vehicle
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was to replace my previous one which was smashed when someone rear ended our vehicle on the way home from Florida this year. The old bike rack sustained damage but not as much as the vehicle that hit us. Even the bikes were OK. I was able to strap the 2 bikes together and made it home without any further trouble. This is a testament to how well built these bike racks are and why I purchased another one as soon as I got home.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Not the Quality I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say not what I expected. Calling Thule today, one of the locks is broken and I just set it up. Not the secure set up I expected. Straps are a hard plastic which makes me think temperature change will have a bad effect on them. Rack wobbles. Haven't driven anywhere with it yet, tomorrow is first time. Good thing I only have one bike because the lock is broken on the the other arm and wouldn't be able to take a second bike.. Locking mechanisms are flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great rack
customer_reviews.text: I have used Thule racks for many years and when I needed a hitch rack for my wife's Enclave I looked at many different models but settled on the Thule 990XT. Many reviews mention it wobbles in the hitch. I found if you tighten it down in the cars hitch mine doesn't wobble. If you tighten the hardware on the rack it doesn't fold down as easy but helps with making the rack tighter. My only complaint would be the rack doesn't fold down when loaded to access the rear of the vehicle.Overall I am happy with this rack and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Toivo

customer_reviews.title: Great bike rack
customer_reviews.text: Great bike rack. I would like to point out if you have a ladies Schwinn Hollywood cruiser bike you will need a seat to handlebar attachment since the moveable center stabilizer on the Thule will not go down far enough for a ladies bike with a low frame. My Schwinn Panther cruiser is okay. We went on a 1000 mile trip and the Thule was stable and easy to get bikes in an out of. Even on rough roads or bridges the bikes were stable.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well with Big 29 inch tires.
customer_reviews.text: Warning- the straps which hold the bicycle wheels to the wheel tray are short and will not work well with 29 inch fat tires. You will have to remove them and improvise.
customer_reviews.author: EmiEmc

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would be better
customer_reviews.text: Thule I thought was better quality than others...I was wrong. I gave it a 3 star because the locks for the rack, I could use my other keys to unlock the lock! I don't trust securing my bike with the locks. The MAIN reason why I bought this over the Yakima is because it had the locks. Now very disappointed that it's not very secure. Anyone can use any small key to unlock the rack and my expensive bikes are gone! Otherwise, everything else is good. THULE needs to do something about their locks! Cheap!!! This is only for the 990XT Doubletrack...I'm not sure if the THULE T2 has same issues or not.
customer_reviews.author: BluYota

customer_reviews.title: Great, but interferes with rear sensors
customer_reviews.text: Loads easily and solid. Only negative is that with backup sensors you cannot leave it on the car when not in use, and it is rather heavy to reinstall whenever you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Sid

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a bike rack that makes sense
customer_reviews.text: I incredibly happy with this fold down, platform bike holder. Assembly was incredibly easy and instructions easy to follow. The price is right for the fold down and thus particular model holds two bikes securely. They even added an additional lock for the actual hitch so that the bike rack is impossible to remove.
customer_reviews.author: cd ybarra

customer_reviews.title: MISSING 1/2 THE HARDWARE
customer_reviews.text: Received product and half the hardware to assemble the rack was missing. (2) bags containing the hardware were opened inside the box and obviously scavenged and the empty bags placed back into the box, and sealed. WHO DOES THAT!!!!!!!!! This is SO disappointing, now I am left with the work to have to find the necessary hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Tod Horner

customer_reviews.title: Great rack. Does everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: When I went looking a hitch mount rack, I started with a Thule Apex four. It was large, heavy, difficult to mount the bikes on and once on, they would have scratched each other. First I decided I didn't really need a rack for four bikes. I then decided to try a different type of rack altogether. This rack is great! It is easy to load, the bikes are secure during travel and due to the locking mechanisms, they're even moderately safe for a quick trip into a store. The construction quality is great and it is easy to store. I love this rack.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Schaller

customer_reviews.title: I love it and can't wait for Spring to come
customer_reviews.text: I love it and can't wait for Spring to come. Nothing like it when you are hitting age 60 and you still love to ride but don't like to put then on top of the car. Not a big fan of the Hook ones on the back but love these.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Longendyke

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: Thule rack has built in locks on the down bar, providing some bike theft deterrence. Thule also includes a lock for the tow hitch fitting. That being said, nothing is perfect and a determined thief will steal your bike and or your rack. The rack is fully adjustable to accommodate two adult sized Road and TT bikes. Kids bikes and lady bikes don't fit well. The rack does wobble a little while driving but the bikes have always arrived safely.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product. I had to get a hitch extender because of my Wrangler's spare tire, but I prefer this over spare tire-mounted racks. Assembly was easy and it's not difficult to load 2 bikes of different sizes/types. I will say a men's 29er barely fits and it is a little difficult to secure the straps that hold the wheels. Thule should have made those longer. Otherwise, no real complaints. I believe this rack provides good value for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bike Rack
customer_reviews.text: Have used this rack many many times traveling so we could take are bikes with us. Works well, easy to put bikes on and strap them down.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Rack, but...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very solid rack. It holds 2 bikes very securely. The only complaint I have is that when I have my race wheels (808s) on my bike the straps that secure the wheels to the cross support of the rack aren't long enough to clip. Fortunately, the hook that holds the frame in place is strong enough that the tire straps are not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bike Rack!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the 990XT rack today. My fiancé helped me assemble it and the instructions were easy to follow. Update... First time using rack with bikes on. This rack is a beeeast. It doesn't rattle around or make noise, it's very sturdy and secure. This rack is by far my favorite😃.
customer_reviews.author: Lette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for moving the bikes around
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for moving the bikes around. Bikes lock in nice and tight. Used to move Beach Cruisers and mountain bikes. No problem with either. Hitch locks into place and hold down tightens down and locks so bikes are safe if you want to stop for a night or a bite to eat. Like how it folds up when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Nestor rosas

customer_reviews.title: Very good except the wheel straps aren't long enough for fat ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good except the wheel straps aren't long enough for fat tire mountain bikes. I wish they'd sell long ones to replace them. Also, it would be good to have a forward tilt feature to allow opening the truck without needing to remove the bikes, but newer models have that I think.
customer_reviews.author: Joro

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: The unit is great, however the padding leaves much to be desired. First time my husband and I used it on a camping trip, it damaged our bikes. The padding wore through and rubbed metal to metal on our bikes rubbing the paint off and digging into the metal of the bikes. We have it on the back of our fifth wheel. Be sure to add extra padding when traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Keefer

customer_reviews.title: Bike Rack for dummies
customer_reviews.text: I hate instruction manuals! Set this bike rack up in no time flat! Loaded my bike, a cruiser, and went to the park to ride. After several miles in hot muggy weather, I loaded my bike back up with ease and took off. Checking my rear view mirror as I winded my way back home down the highway, the bike appeared very stable and I arrived home without incidence. Took my bike off and folded rack up and took off for grocery. So easy! I will be enjoying the park and my bike a lot more now thanks to the Thule 990XT Doubletrack.
customer_reviews.author: Chicotgal

customer_reviews.title: Great rack but NOT secure
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality of the product and I am pleased that I paid the additional cost over several others for a quality product. However, I will not go into the details, but this rack will not prevent your bike from getting stolen by itself, it takes about 30 seconds to get the bike out of the rack (when arms are locked down. So point being, you must use an additional lock to secure your bike to the rack! The awesome thing is that the rack comes with a rack to hitch lock. Again, it is a great sturdy rack, just go the additional step with a lock to the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike rack - we have 2 beach cruisers ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike rack - we have 2 beach cruisers and they go on with no problem. Of note - the womans bike with the lower top bar has to go on the rack first because of the way theyre secured to the bike rack - you wont be able to secure the mans bike if you dont do this
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love our Thule 990XT!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something to haul our bikes to trails in the Midwest. After a little research decided on the Thule 990XT and so far am very happy with the purchase. Have hauled two bikes a couple of times and it was very easy to assemble, and it also is very easy to load and unload. We live in a high rise condo and storage is at a premium, and the rack is a little awkward to haul around once assembled but the quality of the product makes it well worth it. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Condo Man

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bike mount!
customer_reviews.text: This bike mount is a great alternative to truck mounted bike racks. It assembles in 5 minutes and is very simple. The price is worth it for a quality bike rack that includes secure features such is a keyed hitch pin and keyed hooks. This thing folds up nicely when not in use and I hang it on my wall so it doesn't take up a lot of floor (or wall) space.
customer_reviews.author: The Virginia Millers

customer_reviews.title: Carbon Bikes Non-issue.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who talks about this not working for carbon bikes has obviously never owned either. The top tube clamp does not put that much pressure on the bike. After I ordered it I found all these threads talking about getting the tire lock ones, blah blah blah. I haven't used it long but from what I can tell its a non issue.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money for this rack
customer_reviews.text: This rack is much better than the cheap rack I bought a month or two before purchasing this one. The cheap rack did the trick but this Thule is way easiest to use. Easy to install. Easy to shift down in order to open the back of my SUV. Plus, the locking system is great. During our road trip from Philadelphia to Hilton Head, we locked them up and felt confident they wouldn't ride away while we stayed overnight at the Flea Bag Inn. I'd recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MJGilligan

customer_reviews.title: So far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the rack yet. I assembled it OK, easy with no issues except it would not extend enough to clear the spare tire on my 2013 Jeep Wrangler Rubicon. I bought another 2"X 1" receiver which was longer and cleared the spare tire. I set everything up and tested with both bikes OK, ready for our first trip.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike Rack
customer_reviews.text: Spend sometime in research and decided on Thule 990xt. Its as easy to put on as to remove from the Hitch. The only thing that prevent it from getting a 5 stars is that it has some play in the mechanism which causing some movement from side to side that makes me feels very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great bike rack
customer_reviews.text: Installation was generally easy and once the rack is on the vehicle, putting bikes on/off is a delight. However, the lock on the hitch wouldn't go on properly. First time I drove, the part fell off. The dealer, Niagara Cycle was generally unhelpful (we sell racks not parts) and told me to call Thule I did that and they wanted $23 + $10 shipping. Etrailer offered the same part for $17 +$3 I expected some consideration from Niagara or Thule since the part fell off the first time I drove off with the rack mounted
customer_reviews.author: Pearl Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Love my bike rack
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, love the locks and being able to adjust the rack when not in use. I have attached the rack to my pick up and it took no time at all to put together. Shipped within a couple days. Very pleased with everything
customer_reviews.author: Bluecasey

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: This went together in a snap, and is easy to get off and on the car. I've used it in both a 1-1/4" hitch and with the adapter in a 2" hitch, and saw no difference in the stability. The bikes don't move at all, and there is no noticeable sway. It took less than 2 minutes to load two bikes, and even less than that to unload. And I feel extra secure, since there is a hitch lock and a lock for each bike.
customer_reviews.author: farmergirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rack for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rack for the money. Quality Thule as expected. Just took for a 1500 mile round trip and my Trek bikes made it there and back. Super happy with Thule as always
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good bicycle rack
customer_reviews.text: Good bicycle rack. Sometimes the latches holding the tires in place come undone while driving. Not a big issue since I use straps as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this on the back of his truck, and loves how stable the bikes are. It is very easy to use and he is pleased with his selection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Volvo V70 Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Using it to transport 2 female cruiser bikes. You do not need an extra bar to secure the bikes. High quality product. No sway. Like the way you fold it down to access the rear door. Includes lock for the hitch and two locks for the bikes. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great bike rack for us
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great bike rack for us. We use it to carry our two bikes to and from various trails around the city. We've never had any issues with it and find it very easy to use. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a bike rack!
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Wood

customer_reviews.title: This rack rocks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a long road trip with my road bike and it performed flawlessly. Highly recommend for the following reasons: 1. Do not have to worry about bike rack scratching car 2. Looks great up or down (got lots of compliments) 3. Don't have to worry about your bikes being stolen while on the back of your car. 4. Easy to put on / take off car 5. Sturdy- this thing will last 6. Bikes rode for 2000 miles without moving. I never had to worry about my bike falling off like many other bike racks. My main complaint is the lever that controls the arm that swings up and down. It can get difficult to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very solid and easy to put together. Withstands a sharp U-Turn ;-) Only thinf, it has two washers missing which was not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: It is exceptional and has earned it's great reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Researched bike racks thoroughly. These were at or near the top of every review. It is exceptional and has earned it's great reviews!
customer_reviews.author: jambo

customer_reviews.title: Says it's very easy to use but you need a trailer hitch adapter ...
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my daughter and she loves it. Says it's very easy to use but you need a trailer hitch adapter install if you don't already have one on your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: David Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very solid. I really like the locking feature that is included. On a recent 1600 mile trip, we did not even know it was on the car and carrying two bikes unless we looking in the rear view mirror. I would highly recommend this bike rack.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Good Rack
customer_reviews.text: The rack works great. I mistakenly thought it would fold down out of the way to allow the tailgate to open, it does not do that however overall I am satisfied with the product. I believe if you want a rack that allows the tailgate to be opened with a bike loaded you may need one that swings out of the way. Just research carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Held up alright and got alot of use out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Held up alright and got alot of use out of it. After this last road trip the rivets came out of the track for the top bar hook. But it did last through about 8,000 miles and alot of time in the Arizona summer heat before the plastic gave out. Looks fixable, I just havent taken the time to do it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Thule Raceway first and I didn't like it since it seems to press pretty hard on the truck and car paint. On top of that, it didn't work for my bikes. So I returned it and ordered this one instead. Have been out with it a couple times. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike Rack.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to install. I need only one bike mount so I removed one of the rails. Two bolts was all it took. The rack went from 35# to about 20# and it. Only took 5. Minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Brandt

customer_reviews.title: I love it and feel safe traveling with it
customer_reviews.text: I love it and feel safe traveling with it. I know its 40 pounds for safety sake but kind of too heavy for me. I am a senior and not as strong as I used to be in lifting it and placing it into the hitch. Otherwise I do love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Troy

customer_reviews.title: Did lots of research. Glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.text: Great rack for cruisers with fenders. Easy to put bikes on and take off. Make sure you periodically check and tighten the main mounting bolt! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 734baggins

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Solid. More expensive than some of the off brands, but I think from what I've subsequently seen around town, it is a much better build. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: kemp4VT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: High quality construction. Easy to assemble and use. Looks sharp. Easy to add/remove bikes. Good solid product. No appreciable noise or rattles. Do yourself a favor and get one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy to assemble and use. Sturdy and I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bevens

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product, many security locks, receiver adapter could be better
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rack because I had a bike that required support in a rack at the wheels area. The rack is built very well and solid. I will probably try to do something to take some of the play out of by large hitch receiver. I feel a little uneasy about the amount of play in their class 1 to class 3 adapter. Other than that a VERY solid bike rack.
customer_reviews.author: Fyrecomm

customer_reviews.title: Thule Hitch Rack
customer_reviews.text: Love this rack. Easy to mount and operate. Not as heavy as I thought it would be. Item came with missing parts..listing stated a damaged box. They credited my account for a portion of the cost and I went to the local hardware store and bought the missing parts. Fast and honest and much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Thule 990XT Doubletrack Platform Bike Hitch Rack
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bike rack for my husband. He loves it! It replaced another one he had. He is delighted with the ease of operation, etc. Will certainly recommend this rack! Of course, the order came in on time! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: nea

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Well put together and simple to use. Two large 29ers fit perfect and lock easy. All locks on one key and rack is secure to vehicle with same key.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon Biscuit

customer_reviews.title: well done
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built bike rack. My only complaint is it wobbles a bit form side to side. I have never lost a bike, so no big deal. ;) The locks are in good shape since I bought it several months ago and no one has stolen my precious cargo!
customer_reviews.author: Neil W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this....made great! Use it to take our bikes to the Beach (almost 400 miles one way)....the bikes were very secure the entire trip.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Barebo

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised/sways a bit.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and easy to set up. It is VERY heavy. Does sway side to side just a touch.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use will get your bikes loaded up and to a ride really quick and painless
customer_reviews.author: ai589

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike Rack
customer_reviews.text: Thule sure does make a quality product. I found this rack to be very study and durable. It's possible to only install one "rail" on the rack for single-bike operations.
customer_reviews.author: HikingInSierras

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but...
customer_reviews.text: Well made product and while not exactly what I had hoped, it reassures me that the bikes will stay on driving on freeways and thru potholes. Reason for for deduction is that the door with spare tire will NOT clear the folding hitch mount even while down. We have a Jeep Wrangler Sahara and the spare tire is on the larger side. Even with a 8 inch hitch extender, we can't open the door. So unless we get a longer extender, we're left with little access to trunk space.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Thule bike rack
customer_reviews.text: I used this rack on my recent trip to Texas. Very quiet rack while driving. Bikes were very secure. The locking system works great. It is easy to put my bikes on and off. I have a Trek hybrid and my wife has a cruiser bike and both fit easily and snugly. I have had 3 bike racks and this is definitely the best one.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product except that it is extremely difficult to release ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product except that it is extremely difficult to release the latch to raise and lower the vertical bar.
customer_reviews.author: Rae R. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Bike Rack
customer_reviews.text: The rack came and I assembled it in 20 minutes. At first it was whobbly with the bike on it and I tightened it and its fine. Love this bike rack so far. I've only carried one bike on it and it works great and it can hold two bikes. It also has a lock which will help. I double lock it on with a chain too. Glad I went with this one because it seems secure. I live in the country so I have lots bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Jaden

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Everything about it is perfect. Really holds the bikes securely. No bouncing, the bike doesn't touch the car and the wheels are locked into place. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H. Dell

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: the best out there. if you get it at a discount price, is worth the money. I think is the best hitch rack out there... comparing with Yakima, I think Thule is better, even thou more expensive...
customer_reviews.author: DansReviews

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Have used it -easy to install, easy to use, very convenient for storage !
customer_reviews.author: Edward Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unable to tilt when bikes are on. Wheel straps should be longer.
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike carrier
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike carrier! Easy to put on the car, super simple to put bikes onto it! Once you get the bike arrangement set up ...it's a breeze! I ride every weekend not raining....great item as I dont have to life the bike to the roof of the car!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was after for my particular application. Easy to assemble, mount and use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Great for full suspension
customer_reviews.text: Great rack. Only problem is the straps that ratchet over the rims are too short for my rims on my mountain bike. So I just use heavy duty Velcro instead. Works great for a full suspension bike.
customer_reviews.author: Tosha

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy bike rack.
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Easy to use, easy to take on and off. Very secure. I love this.
customer_reviews.author: E. Coburn

customer_reviews.title: extremely convent bike rack, owned for a couple months ...
customer_reviews.text: extremely convent bike rack, owned for a couple months now with no complaints, hope it lasts a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: avp1827

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and mount
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and mount. Does a good job carrying bikes. Have only used once but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Chez

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike rack, keeps the bikes away from the back of the vehicle, really easy to mount and dismount the Bikes, and the rack itself. Some blogs had had negative opinions of the locks on the Upright stanchion which hold the bikes down, after a few uses I found the same problem. overall, a very good rack for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Schnepp

customer_reviews.title: Bike Rack
customer_reviews.text: I have used it on the back of my pick-up and also on the back of my RV. Traveled from Pa. to Key West and had no problem with bikes traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike carrier
customer_reviews.text: First time I have had a cradle style bike carrier and I am happy so far. It went together very easy and fit me SUV, Acadia, very we'll with no side to side play. The locks, all three keyed the same, we're easy to install and worked smoothly. Overall well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: John Menold

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked the bolt t be that same as my trailer ...
customer_reviews.text: Did what I needed.I still use the tailgate without removing rack and that is a plus.I would have liked the bolt t be that same as my trailer hitch locking bolt and small 3/8 bolt lets the hitch lean some but still great.
customer_reviews.author: LaVerne F.Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellant product! I found that using the hitch helped with installation of individual pieces
customer_reviews.author: Walter Zink

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RACK for travel and durable
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS... Great bike rack easy to work with and easy to figure out! We just drove around 2000 miles with it and was easy to get in and out of our back and to get the bikes on and off
customer_reviews.author: Lilleysmith

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift and it is AWSOME. Fits in receiver well and secures my bike with confidence. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to load Bikes
customer_reviews.text: Have a Jeep Grand Cherokee and although have room to lay bikes in the back, the rack is much easier to put bikes on and take off. Also can lock bikes on rack without fear of being taken.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Thule is the brand of choice
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should and is what I was expecting. Sturdy and works well with the 1-1/4 hitch. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B

customer_reviews.title: Hey, nice rack!
customer_reviews.text: No reduction in MPG when folded up and not in use, easy to install and use, sturdy. 'Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walter

customer_reviews.title: great rack
customer_reviews.text: purchased this rack for my RV. very easy to assemble and install easy to use and very sturdy. thule quality. only fault is its a little awkward to place/remove interior bike closest to vehicle
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Thule 990xt met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I had read many reviews for this bike rack and there were no surprises. We have a small car and traveling with our two bikes was fine. However, even with the locks, we still did add our own chains and locks when we parked the car with the bikes on the rack. Overall, I think this was a good purchase and would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great, robust, easy to set up, easy to break down. My partner and I moved across the country with this thing. Securely held two road bikes. No issues whatsoever. Would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Bike Rack
customer_reviews.text: I've Had this Thule rack for well over a year now and traveled all over with it. Absolutly no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Billy BoB

customer_reviews.title: Great bike rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bike rack...worth every penny. Solid construction and easy to put together/use. Cradles the bikes nicely and love the lock component on the upper part as well as the locking pin for the hitch which comes with the rack(you don't need to get an additional lock for that which is great).
customer_reviews.author: JB22

customer_reviews.title: We love this bike rack
customer_reviews.text: We love this bike rack. It's sturdy and easy to use, and it will accommodate both the 2" receiver on my pick-up, and the 1 and 1/4 inch receiver on my wife's crossover.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Imes

customer_reviews.title: Very portable from vehicle to storage
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, easy to install, and secures one or two bikes without effort. The unit folds up and stores nicely on a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to load bikes.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, great bike hitch, easy to use, well made..
customer_reviews.author: peter christian

product_meta.title: Thule 990XT Doubletrack Bike Hitch Rack
product_meta.description:
The Thule 990XT Doubletrack is a lightweight platform hitch rack with an adjustable center mast design that applies pressure to the bike frame. The Thule 990XT Doubletrack can transport two bikes regardless of frame design, suspension, or wheel size.

AMAZON.COM


 The 990XT Doubletrack Platform Hitch Bike Rack is a lightweight platform hitch rack that is ideal for small to mid-sized vehicles that have a trailer hitch receiver. The Doubletrack utilizes adjustable mast hooks to support and secure up to two bicycles at the rear of your vehicle, is compatible with both 1¼-inch and 2-inch hitch receivers and features technology to fold and store the platform when not in use. Additional features include: quick loading and unloading while transporting bikes safely and securely and included locks for both wheel trays as well as the hitch connection. 

The ideal hitch mounted, 2-bike transit solution for small receiver installed vehicles.
View larger. THE HITCH BIKE CARRIER SOLUTION FOR SMALLER VEHICLES
 Although trailer hitch receivers are generally the found on larger vehicles with greater towing power, increasingly they are also found on smaller vehicles. For frequent cyclists who ride in pairs and that already have a receiver on their vehicle or are considering having one installed, Thule's 990XT Doubletrack Platform Bike Hitch Rack is an excellent option. First, the Doubletrack is lightweight and low to the ground. This makes it easy for your car to carry and easy to load. It also fits both 1¼-inch receivers and 2-inch size models (with the included adapter). It accommodates up to two bikes making it a convenient accessory for riding with friends or family. And when not in use, it folds up and out of the way. 

Center mast's ratchet hooks move independently to grab, hold and stabilize each bike quickly and easily.
View larger. Hitch Switch functionality folds and stores platform when not in use.
View larger. EASY, SECURE INSTALLATION AND USE
 Along with the convenience of being lightweight, The Doubletrack is also easy and quick to install using a few simple tools provided, and is ultra secure. To install, first, slide the the 1½ inch hitch with attached backbone assembly into the receiver previously installed on your car and secure with the hitch pin. Use the 2 inch hitch adapter if need be. Next attach the upright tube and "frame hold" hook assembly to it with the bolts and Thule hitch tool provided. Mount the two combined bike tube and wheel holder assemblies. The Doubletrack is ready for your bikes. 

 When you are ready to mount your bikes press the release-button near the base of the upright tube and hook assembly and lower the hooks as far as possible. Place smaller of any two bikes to load on the inner carrier with wheels in wheel holders and handlebars to left side of vehicle. With cam lever in open position, position wheel trays on tube. Move cam lever to closed position to tighten wheel tray in position. The Doubletrack comes with adapters for use in securing road bikes. If need be use them now. Now lift the upright tube release latch and raise the upright tube and hook assembly until it clicks into position, then push the interior bike hook down with firm pressure until it is secure on the bike's top tube. Load second bike with handle bars to the opposite side of of the first, securing bike hook and wheel straps in the same way as the first. Now you can lock the bikes to the tube and hook assembly using the lock cylinders provided and installed earlier. The entire Doubletrack carrier can also be locked to the receiver provided where it overlaps with the hitch with the included Snug-Tite lock. Finally, when not in use the Doubletrack can be folded up towards your vehicle with the push of the Hitch Switch lever and a light push, allowing you to park anywhere you normally would. 

KEY FEATURES
 * Foldable center mast's ratchet hooks move independently to grab, hold and stabilize each bike quickly and easily
 * Reinforced wheel trays slide independently along platforms to eliminate bike-to-bike contact
 * Hitch adapter included to accommodate 1¼ inch or 2 inch receivers with one product
 * Ratcheting wheel strap quickly secures wheels to trays
 * Hitch Switch lever folds and stores platform when not in use
 * Accommodates wheel bases up to 48 inch
 * Carries up to 2 bikes
 * Fits the widest range of bike sizes and shapes � even cruisers with fenders � up to 3 inch wide tires
 * Includes 2 lock cylinders to lock the bikes to hitch rack
 * Snug-Tite receiver lock virtually eliminates hitch rack movement in receiver and locks the hitch rack to the vehicle

SPECIFICATIONS
 * Load Capacity - 2 bikes
 * Fits 1¼ inch Hitch Receivers - Yes
 * Fits 2 inch Hitch Receivers - 1
 * One-Key System Compatible - Yes
 * Fits Most Bikes with Disc Brakes - Yes
 * For Tandem Bikes - No

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 Thule Thule 990XT Doubletrack Platform Bike Hitch Rack, all necessary straps and mounting hardware, and instruction guide and warranty information. 

LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY
 Thule will warranty all Thule brand car rack systems and its accessories manufactured by Thule during the time that an original retail purchaser owns the product. This warranty terminates if a purchaser transfers the product to any other person. No warranty is given for defects caused by normal wear and tear, cosmetic rust, scratches, accidents, unlawful vehicle operation, or modification of, or any types of repair of a load carrier system other than those authorized by Thule. 

ABOUT THULE
 Thule was founded in 1942 by the Thulin family, when Eric Thulin, a true lover of the outdoors, put the Thule name on a pike trap he designed and began to sell in Scandinavia. It wasn't long before he added other practical items to the company's portfolio. By the 1960s, the company began to concentrate on car-related products, including its first roof rack. The Thulin family sold Thule to the publicly listed company Eldon in 1979, and it has continued to grow both organically and through acquisitions ever since. The Thule Group is a world leader in providing transport solutions for an active life.
feature_bullets: Transports 2 bikes via vehicle's 1-1/4 inch, or 2 inch hitch receivers
Wheel trays slide independently along platforms to eliminate bike-to-bike contact
Reinforced wheel trays serve as platforms to eliminate bike-to-bike contact
Ratcheting wheel strap quickly secures wheels to trays
Hitch Switch lever folds and stores platform when not in use
DO NOT install on a trailer or other towed vehicle
